CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Qualification Needed"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/green.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Renewal - Need Info"), IMAGE("/resource/yellow","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Need Info From Client"), IMAGE("/resource/yellow","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Need to Submit"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/brand-0.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Application Submitted"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/purple.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Received"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/pink.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Presented"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/brand-3.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Approved/Closed Won"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/green.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/red.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"On Hold"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/red.png","", 20,20), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Referred"), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/neutral-1.png","", 20,20), "")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Stage Color LE
